title: duffann
author: duffann
content: Hello,We are happy to announce that https://avachance.com is now globally available. Avachance is an Avalanche based lottery game. It is fully operated with the support of Chainlink's VRF system.https://docs.chain.link/docs/vrf/v2/introduction/ . With the help of Chainlink VRF, a fully randomized, secure and transparent number is drawn for each lottery. Every drawn number is tied to a participant so avachance.com never gets the pot. A participant always wins. Avachance.com only gets %10 of total prize pool and nothing more. We always want to be fair and fully transparent. Our contract can be reviewed on Github. Github link is on the main navigation on our website. Main Features and How to Play:-Every lottery has a maximum participant limit. For the first few games, entry fees thus the prize pool will be low.-When you connect your wallet, you will be able to buy a ticket if a lottery is ongoing. After you purchase the ticket, your ticket number will be listed under "My Tickets" section.-Lottery ends when the max players are reached and a random number is drawn automatically with the Chainlink's VRF. Under the past lotteries section, the result of the lottery will be added to the table.-Winning wallet will receive the prize pool automatically just after the lottery ends. No need to pay gas fees or claim the prize pool.-A new lottery will begin shortly after the last lottery ends.-Every lottery will have different total participants and entry fees. Some lotteries will be bigger with a huge prize some will be small.Current lottery is Lottery Number 3 and has 5 max participants limit. We will increase the participant limits thus the prize slowly.Current Lottery:Lottery ID: 3Max Participants: 5Ticket Fee: 1 AVAXTotal Prize : 4.5 AVAXCome and try https://avachance.com. Any comment or feedback is much appreciated.

Imagine someone buying 10 tickets in a lottery that has a limit of 20 participants and the other 10 participants bought only one ticket per player. This would demotivate many people into joining the lottery.Anyway, this is an interesting concept and I wonder why it wasn't implemented before with bigger cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.OP, do you have any marketing strategy to promote this lottery? Perhaps adding a referral system would help for driving free traffic to your website and increasing the number of active players.Good luck with this project.
